techmeme.title: Sources: Sonos has abandoned plans to release a streaming video player, which was set to be the company's major hardware launch in 2025 (Chris Welch/The Verge)
The FCC is creating a security council to bolster US defenses against cyberattacks and help it stay ahead of China in critical technologies, such as AI and 5G (Demetri Sevastopulo/Financial Times)
Sources: an Xbox-branded Asus handheld may debut this year as part of Microsoft's effort to unify Windows and Xbox into a universal library of Xbox and PC games (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Snapchat introduces AI video Lenses, powered by Snap's in-house generative video model, available to subscribers of the $16/month Snapchat Platinum tier (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
The US FTC asks a judge to delay its case accusing Amazon of deceptive practices with Amazon Prime, citing staffing shortfalls (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
